item.title: [Pi] a other way to let npc drops work
item.dc:creator: @jelleplomp jelleplomp
item.description:
@jelleplomp wrote:

Hi guys,
i had problems with my npc drops
so i was looking through “NPChandler”
and found “public void dropItems(int i)”
so i saw :

if(npcs[i].npcType > 0) { int random2 = Misc.random(8); if(random2 == 4) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 12158, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId); }
these are the ones for charms,
so i took that code and changed it to this :

if(npcs[i].npcType > 8528) { int random3 = Misc.random(6); if (random3 == 6) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 18359, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId); }
the 18359 is for the item it should drop
the random3 == 6 is the randomness it would drop
like if it would be 50 in 50 kills you probs have it like 4 times.
so yeah, just wanted you guys to show this,
PLEASE dont complain that its a bad code, i know you can do it better
but i think this is just the easyist way,
Byeee, Pkrrang
